result.execSummary:
The defendant Shaun P. Curran was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shaun P. Curran is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Shaun P. Curran was found guilty of Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Oct 1, 2014 - Probation amended to 12 months per 973.09(2)

miscConds.notes: Court costs, surcharges and supervision fees to be paid during the term of probation.

NO CONTACT WITH Benjamin Lamunion.    May not possess or consume any intoxicants.    May not possess or consume any controlled substances unless prescribed by a physician presently treating the defendant.
Defendant shall undergo all treatment and counseling as agent deems appropriate.
Defendant shall undergo AODA treatment and counseling.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
